title: Educational Convergence of Mathematics and Film: Advanced Mathematical Inquiry Using Film Clips

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics foundations (functions, geometry, statistics) and basic video analysis skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning exploring real-life math problems using movie clips in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify mathematical concepts (geometry, probability, algorithms, etc.) in film clips and explain their real-world applications.
Learners can analyze mathematical expressions in films using an onto-semantic approach and explain their connections to formal mathematical representations.
Learners can design learning tasks reconstructing film clips and validate their pedagogical suitability through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
